description: CSS stylesheet for managing themes and styling the App component, including light and dark theme variables.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, applies background color and text color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component of the application, styles layout for title and links.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link component that applies text color based on theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button component for toggling between light and dark themes.
